locale.message: This plugin provides Disqus comments for articles.
Please enable JavaScript to view the discussion powered by

To enable Disqus discussions for articles you will need to register with Disqus - https://disqus.com/profile/signup/. Once you have an account you will need to create a new site - http://disqus.com/admin/create/. For example, a site created with the title "My Journal" would be given a default Disqus management URL of http://myjournal.disqus.com, where "myjournal" is referred to as the site's "shortname" and is required below.
Please provide the Disqus Shortname that was registered with Disqus.
